name: I'm Sorry (V)
Text: 'Deploy on table. Floating Refinery is suspended on opponent''s turn. During your deploy phase, may deploy a Floating Refinery, a cloud sector (to Bespin), or an Obsidian squadron TIE from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. During your turn, if you control 2 cloud sectors with TIEs, opponent loses 1 Force. (Immune to Alter.)',
